name: cordova.spa
description: minimal mobile SPA+rest interface in vanillajs for cordova

scripts.build: npm run builddev ; cd html/js; cp app.min.js /tmp/. && minify /tmp/app.min.js > app.min.js
scripts.builddev: set -x; cd html/css; find -L $(pwd) -type f -name '*.css' | grep -v app.css | xargs cat > app.css; cd ../js && find -L $(pwd) -type f -name '*.js' | grep -v app.min.js | xargs cat > app.min.js
scripts.monitor: nodemon -i html/css/app.css -e html,js,css -i html/js/app.min.js -w html --exec 'npm run-script buildmonitor'
